channel.title: Poll on Ilm Fruits
channel.description: Recent content in Poll on Ilm Fruits

item.title: Poll: What Series do YOU Want?
item.description: Alhamdulillah, all praise and thanks is due to Allah, who has made Ilm Fruits alhamdulillah a very successful blog. Our recent post on salah questions (and their answers) got a lot of questions (masha’Allah alhamdulillah), so we’re going to take it a step further and roll out … a series. Insha’Allah, starting April 6th (Monday), for the month of April, we’re going to have a series on a single topic. What does this mean?
